nodes.text: Sir Deris Panteer was a Human male who served as a member of House Panteer's Queensguard during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire.

In 3643 BBY, Deris and the Queensguard were on the search for the royal crown of Panteer until the Panteer Royal Transport crashed in the Glarus Valley. After tasking a traveler take the crown from the wreckage and delivering it to Captain Lieber at the Panteer hideout, Deris slowly died from his wounds.
